law.catch_line: Unlawful to operate a dump or landfill site without valid permit.

text.section:
Sec. 11B-7. Unlawful to operate a dump or landfill site without valid permit.
It shall be unlawful for any person to operate or permit to be operated any dump or landfill site in Dade County without a valid current permit issued in the manner herein provided, or to operate or permit to be operated a dump or landfill site from and after the time the permit has been revoked or to operate or permit to be operated any dump or landfill site in violation of any provision of this chapter.
